Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis, and 74th due to, street blockage at 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis, and 74th due to, street blockage at 74th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffery/83rd
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rrted: Jeffery, 83rd, Anthony, Elliott, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 83rd, Anthony, Elliott, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/83rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/18th

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/18th.
